sentences.sentence: The report describes the catastrophic disintegration of the aircraft after the explosion.
sentences.translation: 该报道描述了爆炸后飞机的灾难性崩解。

sentences.sentence: The incident has hastened the disintegration of the club.
sentences.translation: 这一事件加速了该俱乐部的解体。

sentences.sentence: Some of this can be attributed to the disintegration of traditional communities, in which neighbors looked out for one another, she says.
sentences.translation: 她说，这其中的一部分原因可以归结于邻里和睦、互相照顾的传统社区的解体。
